page.title: 16CRAWLEY LEISURE CENTRES
page.content: {Crawley Leisure Centre, at Haslett {Ave.,}gives groups, individuals and clubs, in and out of the district, comprehensive sport and leisure activities. All ages from babies to pensioners (and disabled) use a pool, sports hall, gym and specialist rooms. Unemployed persons may use daytime facilities free of charge. The outdoor artificial athletics track and indoor pool, both of international standards, and the artificial pitch contribute to making this one of the best in the south. Competitive athletics will attract international fields when new seating is installed. Specialist shows cabaret, concerts and exhibitions are also held in the sports hall. Across town{Bewbush}offers complementary indoor sports hall activity. A pool is a possibility here, and an{arts centre is planned to be built on the Hawth.
